prepare.Safari: osascript -e 'tell application "Safari" to activate' -e 'delay 0.2' -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "n" using {command down, shift down}'

start.Safari: osascript -e 'tell application "Safari" to activate' -e 'delay 0.2'  -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "t" using {command down}' -e 'delay 0.2' -e 'tell application "Safari" to set URL of current tab of front window to "{{URL}}"'

closeTab.Safari: osascript -e 'tell application "Safari" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "w" using {command down}'
